text: (Dutare) heliri; manavare, nanu nim'mellara palige allahana dutanagiruvenu. Akasagala mattu bhumiya adhipatyavu avanige (allahanige) seride. Avana horatu bere devarilla. Avane jivantagolisuvavanu mattu marana niduvavanu. Niviga allahanallu atana dutanallu nambike idiri â€“ avaru niraksari pravadiyagiddu, allahanalli hagu avana vacanagalalli nambike ullavaragiddare. Margadarsana padeyalikkagi nivu avarannu anusarisi
